name: ai_agent_liveness_integration
description: Set up Agent Pulse liveness monitoring and heartbeat integration for any AI agent. Includes on-chain liveness attestation, health check endpoints, automated alerting, and dashboard integration. Supports OpenClaw, ElizaOS, and custom agent frameworks.

agentFramework.description: Agent framework (OpenClaw, ElizaOS, custom) and version

agentEndpoint.description: Agent's health check or API endpoint URL

monitoringRequirements.description: Specific monitoring requirements (uptime SLA, alert thresholds, etc.)

deliverable: Complete liveness integration configuration including health check endpoints, heartbeat cron setup, on-chain attestation script, alerting rules, and integration documentation. Delivered as structured JSON.
